tool.name: MethylIT: pool from GRanges list
tool.command: #import os #import re #set input_data_dir='input_data_dir' mkdir input_data_dir && #for $i in $lr: #set file_name = $i.file_name #set identifier = re.sub('[^\s\w\-\\.]', '_', str($i.element_identifier)) ln -s '$file_name' '$input_data_dir/$identifier' && #end for Rscript '$__tool_directory__/methylit_pool_from_granges_list.R' --input_data_dir '$input_data_dir' --stat '$stat_cond.stat' #if str($stat_cond.stat) == "jackmean": --jstat '$stat_cond.jstat' #end if --num_cores \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4} --prob '$prob_cond.prob' #if str($prob_cond.prob) == 'yes': --column_number $column_number #else: --column_number 1 #end if --output '$output' &>process_log.txt

param.name: stat
param.label: Select statistic used to estimate the methylation pool

param.name: jstat
param.label: Select the option to compute the jacknife vector and corresponding mean of the selected statistics

param.name: prob
param.label: Is the variable for pooling is between 0 and 1?

param.name: column_number
param.label: Column number of the probability values in the GRanges files

tool.help:
**What it does**
aDownload supplemental files from a specified GEO dataset.
Embryonic stem cells datasets
- GSM2041690 - GSM2041691 - GSM2041692
Breast tissues (normal, cancer, metastasis)
- GSM1279517 - GSM1279514 - GSM1279513
